io.hekate.network.netty

Class NettyClientFactory<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.hekate.network.netty.NettyClientFactory<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Base type of messages that can be sent/received by NetworkClients.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    NetworkConnector<T>

    public class NettyClientFactory<T>
extends Object
implements NetworkConnector<T>
    Configurable factory for Netty-based NetworkClients.

      • getProtocol

        public String getProtocol()
        Returns the protocol identifier (see setProtocol(String)).
        Returns:
        Protocol identifier.

      • setProtocol

        public void setProtocol(String protocol)
        Sets the protocol identifier. Can contain only alpha-numeric characters and non-repeatable dots/hyphens.

        Must be the same with the server-side protocol identifier (see NetworkServerHandlerConfig.setProtocol(String)).

        This parameter is mandatory and doesn't have a default value.

        Parameters:
        protocol - Protocol identifier (can contain only alpha-numeric characters and non-repeatable dots/hyphens).

      • withProtocol

        Returns:

      • setConnectTimeout

        public void setConnectTimeout(Integer connectTimeout)
        Sets the timeout in milliseconds for establishing a TCP socket connection to a remote node.

        This parameter is optional and if not specified then no timeout will happen.

        Parameters:
        connectTimeout - Timeout in milliseconds.

      • withConnectTimeout

      • getIdleTimeout

        public long getIdleTimeout()
        Returns the timeout in milliseconds for NetworkClients to stay idle before being automatically disconnected (see setIdleTimeout(long)).
        Returns:
        Timeout in milliseconds.

      • setIdleTimeout

        public void setIdleTimeout(long idleTimeout)
        Sets the timeout in milliseconds for NetworkClients to stay idle before being automatically disconnected.

        NetworkClients are considered to be idle if no messages are send/received for the specified time interval. When idle client is detected it will be automatically disconnected.

        If value of this parameter is less than or equals to zero then idle clients tracking is disabled.

        Default value of this parameter is 0.

        Parameters:
        idleTimeout - Timeout in milliseconds.

      • withIdleTimeout

        public NettyClientFactory<T> withIdleTimeout(long idleTimeout)
        Fluent-style version of setIdleTimeout(long).
        Parameters:
        idleTimeout - Timeout in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        This instance.

      • getTcpNoDelay

        public boolean getTcpNoDelay()
        Returns true if TCP_NODELAY option must be set on TCP socket connections (see setTcpNoDelay(boolean)).
        Returns:
        true if TCP_NODELAY option must be set.

      • setTcpNoDelay

        public void setTcpNoDelay(boolean tcpNoDelay)
        Sets the flag indicating that TCP_NODELAY option must be set on TCP socket connections.

        Please see Nagle's algorithm for more info.

        Default value of this parameter is false.

        Parameters:
        tcpNoDelay - true if TCP_NODELAY option must be set.

      • withTcpNoDelay

        public NettyClientFactory<T> withTcpNoDelay(boolean tcpNoDelay)
        Fluent-style version of setTcpNoDelay(boolean).
        Parameters:
        tcpNoDelay - true if TCP_NODELAY option must be set.
        Returns:
        This instance.

      • getSsl

        public io.netty.handler.ssl.SslContext getSsl()
        Returns the SSL context (see setSsl(SslContext)).
        Returns:
        SSL context.

      • setSsl

        public void setSsl(io.netty.handler.ssl.SslContext ssl)
        Sets the SSL context that should be used to secure all network communications.

        This parameter is optional and if not specified then no encryption will be applied.

        Note: If SSL is configured for the client then it should be configured on the server side too (see NettyServerFactory.setSsl(SslContext)).

        Parameters:
        ssl - SSL context.

      • withSsl

        public NettyClientFactory<T> withSsl(io.netty.handler.ssl.SslContext ssl)
        Fluent-style version of setSsl(SslContext).
        Parameters:
        ssl - SSL context.
        Returns:
        SSL context.
